Be aware of the official cyclone warning by listening to the radio or other authentic sources. Install storm shutters or board up glass windows. Keep all the doors and windows closed. 


 Do not go near loose electric wires. Avoid going to areas covered with floodwater. Stay away from sewerage lines, gutters and drains. 


 If you are asked to evacuate, do not hesitate. Move to a house built on high grounds. Do not move outside the house immediately after the eye passes, as there will be wind gusts from the opposite direction.
